mapper.select: select budget_num from budget_info where budget between #{budget}*0.9 and #{budget}*1.1;

select budget_info.budget_num, product.main_category, sum(product.price) price_sum from budget_info,budget_list,product where budget_info.budget_num=#{budget_num} and budget_info.budget_num=budget_list.budget_num and budget_list.pro_id=product.pro_id group by product.main_category;
